name: I'm Over Lorde
description:
Controls:
WASD / Arrow keys - Move
Space - Shoot

Concept:
Lorde's hit new chart bop 'Greenlight' had been playing in my head and on my phone on repeat for the past few weeks. During a 24hr GameJam with the theme of 'Overlords' I officially decided I was over Lorde, and this game is an ode to the song I now cannot stand.

The game was actually created within 4 hours due to a complete scrapping of our original plan after the first 20. It was created in participation of Sheffield University's 4th GameJam by:
Abby Smith - Programming
Le Coq Sportif - Sprite Creation

Tools:
Engine - Unity
Art - Aseprite
